title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia          Parks Climate Challenge participants snorkel on Ross Lake to conduct a fish survey. Megan McGinty, North Cascades Institute   Â    Photos  Browse galleries of still images from the park's photo collection and download royalty-free copies. Additional images are available from our Flickr site.  Videos Enjoy videos from North Cascades and park partners.  Audio Discover the stories of the North Cascades through audio.  Webcams Watch webcams in Newhalem and Stehekin areas of the North Cascades.
